Information Gathering Techniques

Date: April 3rd , 2021 by Orux

Passive collection

Web information$

Whois: collect company name, country, dns, owner
NetCraft, Build With, WappaLyzer: Identify the technologies used

General information$

Shodan: Show ports, services, country, vulns
DNS Checker: Show dns records
Auto Dorks: Online tool for google dorks

Active collection

Network information$

Scan all port with service and version:
nmap -sCV -p- --min-rate 1000 -n -v orux-0.github.io
Share
